member.name: M:uScript.Unturned.ScriptEvent.EventHook(System.Object@)
member.summary: Indicates the event info to hook to when a script using this event is loaded. Instance should be set to null if the event is static.

member.name: M:uScript.Unturned.ScriptEvent.RunEvent(uScript.Unturned.ScriptEvent,uScript.Core.ExpressionValue[])
member.summary: Calling this will invoke the related events in each script. Note: args will be updated accordingly after this is run (useful for reference arguments).
member.param: The arguments that will be processed for each script event.

member.name: T:uScript.Unturned.ScriptModuleBase
member.summary: Should only be inherited by a single class in your entire module.

member.name: M:uScript.Unturned.ScriptModuleBase.OnModuleLoaded
member.summary: This method is called as soon as the module assembly is loaded. You can use this method to implement custom events or any other kind of preprocessing.
